summary: This is a forwarded email chain regarding a quote for a replacement camera (specifically camera 3515) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The email notes the cameras are FITARA approved and that the price has dropped significantly.

events.title: Email regarding MCC camera replacement quote
events.description: An email is forwarded containing a quote for a FITARA-approved replacement camera for camera 3515 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, noting a significant price drop.

keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email chain dated September 4, 2018.
The subject concerns obtaining a quote for a replacement camera (camera 3515) for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The proposed replacement cameras are noted as being 'FITARA approved'.
The email states that the price for the cameras 'has dropped significantly'.
The document is administrative in nature, relating to facility equipment procurement at a federal detention center.
